Class Basketball

java.lang.Object
Game
Basketball
public class Basketball
extends Game
Basketball is a class that extend Game and implements the abstract methods This class will set up a game that replicates scoring in basketball

    private int currentPeriods
    private int currentPeriods is used to get track of the current period

    private int numPeriods is used to set the max number of periods in basketball

    private String periodName is used to set the period type

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors 
    Constructor Description
    Basketball​(Team team1, Team team2)
    Basketball constructor will take in two teams and set the score array with each team will also set the periodName,numPeriods, and currentPeriods
